-----Original Message-----
From: AlwaysLearning@yahoogroups.com

_______________________________________________

5d. Re: Working Teens
Posted by: "Sandra Dodd" Sandra@... sandralynndodd
Date: Mon Jun 11, 2007 3:17 pm ((PDT))

Kelly Lovejoy's recommendation is to set up a poop-scooping service
and make good money that way, cleaning dog poo out of people's back
yards.

Sandra

-=-=-=-

Yes! I suggest that all the time.

Nobody's seemed to have taken the idea and run with it yet though!

At 13, entrepreneurship is the way to go! Or, as a friend of mine calls
it: entreMANUREship. <bwg>


~Kelly

Kelly Lovejoy
Conference Coordinator
Live and Learn Unschooling Conference
